name: Belug's boring Minesweeper
description:
This is a classic, a timer that tics the seconds, a counter that tells you how many mines are left and tiles to click.

There are some extras, I've added 12 background images behind the tiles, relaxation music from Kevin MacLeod, a zoom function, a high score for each difficulty and multiple types of tiles.

This is a personal challenge it's the first complete game that I've made. Before this one, I've only made game jams games, not that it took a lot of hours, but it has fewer cut corners in it. It's not much, but I've already multiple ideas to improve it, but it means refactoring everything, so I decided to finish what I had, release it to the world and start the other version.

If you find bugs please leave them in the comments.

Thanks, Belug.

Made with Godot
